p: The selectivity index (SI) of the methoxyflavones (PMF and PMF-OH) against HBV was 10,000 and 102 respectively, with EC 50 values of 0.001 µM for PMF and 0.098 µM for PMF-OH. These compounds showed the highest antiviral activity against HBV (Figure 2A (Fig. 2)). Additionally, MyrG presents an SI of 6667 and an EC 50= 0.015 µM while MyrGG showed an SI of 8.3 and EC 50= 12 µM (Figure 2B (Fig. 2)).
